Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have the potential to meet the growing need for electrical power generation if the cost per megawatt can be further reduced.
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components

Sentencas: Currently, SOFC stacks are replaced too frequently to be cost competitive.
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components

Sentencas: SOFC service life can be extended by preventing chromium- (Cr-) bearing species from evaporating from the interior surfaces of balance of plant (BOP) components and poisoning the cathode to increase the lifetime.
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components

Sentencas: We have developed yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) and aluminum oxide- (Al(2)O3(-))
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components

Sentencas: modified sol-gel paints or inks for coating BOP components.
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components

Sentencas: 430 stainless steel (430SS) substrates with three surface conditions were coated with the 0.8-1.5 mu m thick YSZ and Al2O3 paints.
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components

Sentencas: The coated 430SS samples were tested for thermal cycling resistance, thermal soak, and Cr evaporation.
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components

Sentencas: Thermal soak and thermal cycling test results show promise for the YSZ-coated 430SS substrates.
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components

Sentencas: The Cr evaporation test of a coated substrate showed a 51% reduction in Cr generation, when compared with a bare substrate.
Titulo: Protective Ceramic Coatings for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) Balance-of-Plant Components
